title: Content Management System, uzlist.com
description:
Uzlist.com is a classifieds website, Content managment system (CMS), it allows publishing, editing and modifying content as well as maintenance from a central interface. Website was lunched in September, 2013. Web app is in Russian langauge and it is intended for Russia and Russian speaking countries.

Uzlist.com is written in 100% Angularjs and raw JavaScript, it utilises API.
details:
Project Details:

  • Client-server application
  • Create, edit, delete content
  • Image upload, add image to the content
  • User login, registration
  • Automatic email sending
  • Perform database search
  • Live example
  • Source code available upon request
